name: Roll or Die - GMTK 2022
description:
Roll or Die! You are a game master that will have to literally roll a dice or get crushed by your enemies!

Controls

- WASD to move

- Mouse Left to throw your dice

You'll have to pick up dice to be able to attack. Every time you pick one, it will have a number attached to it that indicates the damage it'll deal. The die bounces off of walls and enemies, and when it hits one, it'll be re-rolled to have another damage input.

There are multiple dice types , however, you can only hold one die at a time, and enemies will spawn until there are none left, much like little waves. You automatically go to the next level once you defeat all enemies.
